EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Driving Real Insights Through Data Science_Q415.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Driving Real Insights Through Data Science
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Major changes in industries have been witnessed by the emergence of data-driven discoveries and applications. Many organizations are bringing together their data, and looking to drive change. But the ability to generate new insights in real time from a massive sets of data is still far from commonplace.
Join <http://pivotal.io/event/driving-real-insights-through-data-science/bridgewater?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=driving-real-insights-through-data-science> data technology experts and data scientists from Pivotal to get the latest business perspective on how data science and engineering can be used to accelerate the generation of new insights.
If you work in R&D or Manufacturing, this will be an eye-opening event for you. The sessions cover topics of interest to business leaders, developers, architects, data scientists and technical managers.
Who Should Attend If you work in R&D or Manufacturing, this will be an eye-opening event for you. The sessions cover topics of interest to business leaders, developers, architects, data scientists and technical managers.
Register now <http://pivotal.io/event/driving-real-insights-through-data-science/bridgewater?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=driving-real-insights-through-data-science> for this complimentary event. Space is limited, so RSVP today to reserve your seat. DRIVING REAL INSIGHTS THROUGH DATA SCIENCE TUESDAY OCTOBER 27, 2015 12:00 PM - 4:30 PM REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/event/driving-real-insights-through-data-science/bridgewater?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=driving-real-insights-through-data-science>
